author: Orlando Matos and Carmen Sesin
title: Cubans grapple with coronavirus amid shortages and U.S. embargo
description: Cubans are grappling with slowly rising coronavirus cases amid issues such as limited water and shortages of items like soap, as well as the reality of a tightened U.S. embargo.
content:
HAVANA Before Cuba announced late Monday that schools would be suspended to prevent the spread of the new coronavirus, documentary filmmaker Ingrid León, 42, was already keeping her son home.
Her son's school in Fontanar, a suburb of Havana near the airport,… [+5327 chars]
